66 #define FTSK_TASK_ENGINE_STACK_SIZE_IN_BYTES (1024u)
67

69 #define FTSK_TASK_ENGINE_PRIORITY (OS_PRIORITY_REAL_TIME)
70

244 /*========== Extern Function Prototypes =====================================*/
245 /**
246  * @brief Initializes the database
247  * @details Start up after scheduler starts
248  * @warning Do not change the content of this function. This will very likely
249  * break the system. This function is kept in the configuration file
250  * to have a uniform task configuration.
251  */
252 extern void FTSK_InitializeUserCodeEngine(void);
253 
254 /**
255  * @brief Engine task for the database and the system monitoring module
256  * @details Start up after scheduler start. First task to be run, all other
257  * tasks only starts when this task has started
258  * @warning Do not change the content of this function. This will very likely
259  * break the system. This function is kept in the configuration file
260  * to have a uniform task configuration.
261  */
262 extern void FTSK_RunUserCodeEngine(void);
263 
264 /**
265  * @brief Initialization function before all tasks started
266  * @details This function is called after the scheduler started but before any
267  * cyclic task runs. Here modules get initialized that are not used
268  * during the startup process.
269  */
270 extern void FTSK_InitializeUserCodePreCyclicTasks(void);
271 
272 /**
273  * @brief Cyclic 1 ms task
274  * @details TODO
275  */
276 extern void FTSK_RunUserCodeCyclic1ms(void);
277 
278 /**
279  * @brief Cyclic 10 ms task
280  * @details TODO
281  */
282 extern void FTSK_RunUserCodeCyclic10ms(void);
283 
284 /**
285  * @brief Cyclic 100 ms task
286  * @details TODO
287  */
288 extern void FTSK_RunUserCodeCyclic100ms(void);
289 
290 /**
291  * @brief Cyclic 100 ms task for algorithms
292  * @details TODO
293  */
294 extern void FTSK_RunUserCodeCyclicAlgorithm100ms(void);
295 
296 /**
297  * @brief Continuously running task for I2C
298  * @details Implements the MCU communication over I2C
299  */
300 extern void FTSK_RunUserCodeI2c(void);
301 
302 /**
303  * @brief Continuously running task for AFEs
304  * @details Implements the communications with AFEs without state machine.
305  */
306 extern void FTSK_RunUserCodeAfe(void);
307 
308 /**
309  * @brief Idle task
310  * @details Called by #vApplicationIdleHook() if configUSE_IDLE_HOOK in
311  * FreeRTOSConfig.h is enabled. If you do not need this hook, you can
312  * disable it in the FreeRTOS configuration.
313  */
314 extern void FTSK_RunUserCodeIdle(void);
